name: Walk Your Dog
description:
Made within 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Topic: Out Of Control.

Pets are lovely, but they can sometimes be out of control!

A simple little game where you try to pull your dog to go the desired direction.

Objective:

Cause chaos by knocking down boxes with your dog. Avoid knocking them down yourself or you will have to pay for the loss!

Controls:
  • Move your mouse / WASD : move the character around her dog.
  • Hold LMB / Shift : Boost Control, which can make you move faster.
